DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if a recruitment maneuver combined with protective ventilatory strategy could reduce the pulmonary and systemic inflammatory responses to one-lung ventilation during thoracic surgery.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Recruitment Maneuver With Protective Ventilation During Thoracic Surgery
DOC.criteria: 20 Years and older Patients undergoing thoracic surgery Emergency surgery Heart failure Pulmonary hypertension Forced vital capacity or forced expiratory volume in 1 sec < 50% of the predicted values Coagulation disorder Pulmonary or extrapulmonary infections History of treatment with steroid in 3 months before surgery History of recurrent pneumothorax History of lung resection surgery
